CV.sliderResponsiveAlt: Represents multiple screens for responsive design
CV.sliderTitle: Are you looking for a developer to manage your web projects?
CV.sliderText1: I can strengthen your team both in graphic design and development.
CV.sliderText2: Would you be willing to give me a chance?
CV.cardDesignFigcaption: Mastering design tools and creating unique visuals.
CV.cardFrontEndFigcaption: Integration and development of high-performance and adaptive websites.
CV.cardBackEndFigcaption: Creating back-end solutions to manage data and site functionality.
CV.cardSEOFigcaption: Search engine optimization to improve website visibility.
CV.presentationText: Passionate about web development and design for many years, I have gained solid experience working on various innovative projects. My goal is to create high-performance and aesthetic solutions to meet my clients' needs.
CV.whoAmIText: I am a talented web developer and designer, capable of working on various projects ranging from website creation to mobile applications. My skills include mastering programming languages such as JavaScript, PHP, and HTML/CSS.

GameAcceuil.title: Catch Me If You Can!
GameAcceuil.rules:
Catch the object by moving your mouse cursor over it.
The object escapes and moves when the cursor gets closer.
Catch the object 10 times to advance to the next level.
At each level, the object moves faster and rotates around itself.
On the side, check your level, remaining clicks, score, and enter your name if you win.
Good luck and have fun!
